description: Product{k=1 to n}[s(n,k)], where s(n,k) is unsigned Stirling number of the first kind. (s(n,k) = number of permutations of n elements which contain exactly k cycles.)
maple: a:=n->mul(stirling1(n, k), k=1..n): seq(abs(a(n)), n=1..10); - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jun 28 2007
author: _Leroy Quet_, Jan 02 2001
extensions: One more term (a(11)) from _Harvey P. Dale_, Oct 18 2014
